name: St. Louis Pork Steaks
author: Marcus Chavers
summary: If you are from St. Louis or have relatives here, you know about Pork Steaks! MMMMMM.  This is a family recipe that my whole family enjoys.  I hope you will as well.  The seasoned cider vinegar leaves grilled pork steaks nice and juicy.
ingredients: ⅛ teaspoon seasoned pepper to taste
directions: Season the pork steaks on both sides with seasoned salt and seasoned pepper
In a large bowl, stir together the vinegar and water, and season with seasoned salt and seasoned pepper to taste
Place pork steaks on the grill
Baste steaks with the vinegar mixture on both sides during the first 15 minutes of grilling
Continue to cook steaks to desired doneness, 10 to 15 more minutes
